caption: This photograph captures a rural scene featuring two cattle with long, curved horns, likely Texas Longhorns, grazing in a field. The cattle are in profile, one mostly facing the camera and the other facing away. The field is lush with green grass and dotted with various colorful wildflowers, creating a vivid and natural setting. The background features a line of trees along the horizon under a slightly overcast sky. The lighting suggests it might be either early morning or late afternoon, casting a gentle light over the scene. The overall composition emphasizes the tranquility and beauty of a pastoral landscape.
title: Longhorn cattle grazing in lyndon b.  Johnson state park
